Soap Dispenser: Attach a small bottle of hand soap to the duck and use it as a soap dispenser in the bathroom. The duck's hole can be used to dispense soap when pressed.
Plant Marker: Write the name of each plant on the duck's body and use it as a plant marker in the garden or greenhouse.
Bath Toy: Use the rubber duck as a bath toy for children. They can hold onto the duck while taking a bath and use it as a fun and educational tool.
Dog Toy: Give the rubber duck to a dog as a chew toy. The duck's hole can be used to hold a small treat or a bone to keep the dog entertained.
Pencil Holder: Cut the rubber duck in half lengthwise and use it as a pencil holder on a desk or in a pencil case.
